payload.urs_content:
Simple Test Document for Unicode Validation

This is a basic User Requirements Specification for testing Phoenix observability enhancements.

Requirements:
1. System shall process pharmaceutical data with GAMP-5 compliance
2. System shall handle Unicode characters: 🧑‍⚕️ ✅ ❌ 📋 🔍 ⚡
3. System shall maintain audit trails for regulatory compliance

Classification: This appears to be a Category 5 (Custom Application) system requiring full validation.
payload.author: system
